thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza London Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Loved it
thread.title_full: Loved it - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PaulaNorwich_UK
title: Loved it
text: Booked through IHG, was given an upgrade on arrival. The room was huge. Massive bed. Very comfortable. Lovely toiletries and the sleep spray really does work. Great breakfast in the morning with a wide choice. Only thing missing was porridge. Would definitely recommend. One minute from Gloucester Road tube station. 10 - 15 min walk to the Royal Albert Hall and Hyde Park. Very convenient for the museums. Great location.
